017package org.spongepowered.configurate.loader;
018
019import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
020import org.spongepowered.configurate.ConfigurationNode;
021import org.spongepowered.configurate.ConfigurationOptions;
022
023import java.io.IOException;
024
025/**
026 * Represents an object which can load and save {@link ConfigurationNode} objects in a specific
027 * configuration format.
028 *
029 * <p>An abstract implementation is provided by {@link AbstractConfigurationLoader}.</p>
030 *
031 * @param <N> The {@link ConfigurationNode} type produced by the loader
032 */
033public interface ConfigurationLoader<N extends ConfigurationNode> {
034
035    /**
036     * Gets the default {@link ConfigurationOptions} used by the loader.
037     *
038     * <p>New nodes will be created using the default options if a specific set is not defined.</p>
039     *
040     * @return The default options
041     */
042    @NonNull
043    ConfigurationOptions getDefaultOptions();
044
045    /**
046     * Attempts to load a {@link ConfigurationNode} using this loader, from the defined source.
047     *
048     * <p>The resultant node represents the root of the configuration being loaded.</p>
049     *
050     * <p>The {@link #getDefaultOptions() default options} will be used to construct the resultant
051     * configuration nodes.</p>
052     *
053     * @return The newly constructed node
054     * @throws IOException if any sort of error occurs with reading or parsing the configuration
055     */
056    @NonNull
057    default N load() throws IOException {
058        return load(getDefaultOptions());
059    }
060
061    /**
062     * Attempts to load a {@link ConfigurationNode} using this loader, from the defined source.
063     *
064     * <p>The resultant node represents the root of the configuration being loaded.</p>
065     *
066     * @param options The options to load with
067     * @return The newly constructed node
068     * @throws IOException if any sort of error occurs with reading or parsing the configuration
069     */
070    @NonNull
071    N load(@NonNull ConfigurationOptions options) throws IOException;
072
073    /**
074     * Attempts to save a {@link ConfigurationNode} using this loader, to the defined sink.
075     *
076     * @param node The node to save
077     * @throws IOException if any sort of error occurs with writing or generating the configuration
078     */
079    void save(@NonNull ConfigurationNode node) throws IOException;
080
081    /**
082     * Return an empty node of the most appropriate type for this loader, using the default options.
083     *
084     * @return The appropriate node type
085     */
086    @NonNull
087    default N createEmptyNode() {
088        return createEmptyNode(getDefaultOptions());
089    }
090
091    /**
092     * Return an empty node of the most appropriate type for this loader
093     *
094     * @param options The options to use with this node. Must not be null (see {@link ConfigurationOptions#defaults()})
095     * @return The appropriate node type
096     */
097    @NonNull
098    N createEmptyNode(@NonNull ConfigurationOptions options);
099
100    /**
101     * Gets if this loader is capable of loading configurations.
102     *
103     * @return If this loader can load
104     */
105    default boolean canLoad() {
106        return true;
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * Gets if this loader is capable of saving configurations.
111     *
112     * @return If this loader can save
113     */
114    default boolean canSave() {
115        return true;
116    }
117}
